name: Marble Revolution Racing
description:
*AN XBOX CONTROLLER IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME FOR NOW*

A simple racing game revolving around using a marble instead of a typical car!

How to play:

  • Mouse: Navigate Menus
  • Left Stick: Steer
  • Right Stick: Control Camera
  • Right Trigger: Accelerate
  • Left Trigger: Brake/Reverse
  • Start: Pause
  • Select: Change Music Track

NOTE: This is a work in progress and EVERYTHING is subject to change. Let me know what you think for the time being!
